entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:52 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 3:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.9°C
Wind: W 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 over the Highlands. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero except near minus 4 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 3 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5 except minus 11 over the Highlands. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5 except minus 11 over the Highlands. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
